010package imagingbook.pub.threshold.global;
011
012/**
013 * This thresholder implements the algorithm proposed by Ridler and Calvard (1978),
014 * T.W. Ridler, S. Calvard, Picture thresholding using an iterative selection method,
015 * IEEE Trans. System, Man and Cybernetics, SMC-8 (August 1978) 630-632.
016 * described in Glasbey/Horgan: "Image Analysis for the Biological Sciences" (Ch. 4).
017 * 
018 * Slow version using explicit recomputation of background and foreground means 
019 * in every iteration.
020 */
021public class IsodataThresholderSlow extends GlobalThresholder {
022        
023        private int MAX_ITERATIONS = 100;
024        
025        public IsodataThresholderSlow() {
026                super();
027        }
028
029        public int getThreshold(int[] h) {
030                int K = h.length;
031                int q = (int) mean(h, 0, K-1);  // start with the total mean
032                int q_;
033                
034                int i = 0;      // iteration counter
035                do {
036                        i++;
037                        int nB = count(h, 0, q);
038                        int nF = count(h, q+1, K-1);
039                        if (nB == 0 || nF == 0)
040                                return -1;
041                        double meanB = mean(h, 0, q);
042                        double meanF = mean(h, q+1, K-1);
043                        q_ = q;                         
044                        q = (int)((meanB + meanF)/2);
045                } while (q != q_ && i < MAX_ITERATIONS);
046                
047                return q;
048        }
049
050}
